basicInfo.name: 趙雲
basicInfo.flavor: When Guan Yu was elevated to the title of King Muan, Zhao Yun was likewise elevated to the title of Marquis Shunping. But the common people insisted on calling him \"King Shunping\" rather than \"Marquis\" as a sign of their respect.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Tornado Thrust
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Splitting Tornado Thrust
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Bleed [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Chance: Bleed chance becomes 85%.

Passive.name: Protective Aura
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Blind Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Blind Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Effect Resist Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Resist Boost to 40%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 100% of Physical Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Reduces skill cooldowns by 8s when hit by an enemy's attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Zhuge Liang, Guan Yu, a good spear, books, refined leisure, loyalty, devotion, service, seafood
profile.story: When Guan Yu was elevated to the title of King Muan, Zhao Yun was likewise elevated to the title of Marquis Shunping. But the common people insisted on calling him \"King Shunping\" rather than \"Marquis\" as a sign of their respect.

basicInfo.name: 趙雲
basicInfo.flavor: Zhao Yun earned the nickname \"General of Tiger's Might\" after single-handedly charging through enemy lines to rescue his comrades and returning to the stronghold in safety.

 - Self

basicInfo.name: 趙雲
basicInfo.flavor: Zhao Yun was famed for his remarkable intellect and martial arts skills from a young age, and he earned the nickname \"Zilong,\" meaning \"Little Dragon.\" Soon after, he entered Guan Yu's service upon learning he was recruiting soldiers.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - Self
